thread.title: Turkey's Erdogan says tumbling lira not a concern

title: Turkey's Erdogan says tumbling lira not a concern
text:
Turkey's Erdogan says tumbling lira not a concern 7:55pm IST - 01:42 
Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan struck back at international investors on Thursday, saying that no one could bring the country to heel by using exchange rates. As Kate King reports, he says the precipitous fall in the lira currency, is a conspiracy from outside.
